ViewAttribute.Name: vendorName
ViewAttribute.Expression: select vendor_name from ap_suppliers where vendor_id=ApInvoicesEO.vendor_id

ViewAttribute.Name: poNum
ViewAttribute.Expression: select segment1 from po_headers_all a where a.po_header_id= nvl(ApInvoicesEO.po_header_id,ApInvoicesEO.quick_po_header_id)

ViewAttribute.Name: payTermName
ViewAttribute.Expression: select name from ap_terms a where a.term_id=ApInvoicesEO.terms_id

ViewAttribute.Name: discountDueDate
ViewAttribute.Expression: select nvl(a.discount_date,a.due_date) from ap_payment_schedules_all a where a.invoice_id=ApInvoicesEO.invoice_id

ViewAttribute.Name: poType
ViewAttribute.Expression: select type_lookup_code from po_headers_all a where a.po_header_id=nvl(ApInvoicesEO.po_header_id,ApInvoicesEO.quick_po_header_id)

ViewAttribute.Name: vendorSiteCde
ViewAttribute.Expression: select vendor_site_code from ap_supplier_sites_all a where a.vendor_site_id=ApInvoicesEO.vendor_site_id

ViewAttribute.Name: freightTolerance
ViewAttribute.Expression: select max_freight_amt from xx_ap_custom_tolerances a where a.supplier_id=ApInvoicesEO.vendor_id and a.supplier_site_id=ApInvoicesEO.vendor_site_id and a.org_id=ApInvoicesEO.org_id

ViewAttribute.Name: venNo
ViewAttribute.Expression: select segment1 from ap_suppliers where vendor_id=ApInvoicesEO.vendor_id
